title: Swinney: Hurts needs to be 'best version of himself'
content: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney talks about Clemson reloading going into the 2018 season while attending the Jimmy Rane Foundation banquet in Montgomery honoring his college coach Gene Stallings. Clemson coach Dabo Swinney talks about Alabama quarterback Jalen Hurts while attending the Jimmy Rane Foundation banquet in Montgomery honoring his college coach Gene Stallings. Clemson coach Dabo Swinney talks about legalized sports gambling while attending the Jimmy Rane Foundation banquet in Montgomery honoring his college coach Gene Stallings. Alabama and Clemson could make similar history in college football this season. Never in the four major professional sports in North America had the same two teams
